survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers using subscription-based coffee delivery services to understand satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based coffee delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and neutral.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based coffee delivery service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a coffee subscription service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple options to identify key decision-making factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Limit selection to 3 options.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a coffee subscription service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you receive coffee deliveries from your subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for uncommon frequencies.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an additional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How often do you receive coffee deliveries from your subscription service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current coffee subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current coffee subscription service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current coffee subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current coffee subscription service to others?
